name: LinkedIn Search Results or Employees Export & Data Enrichment
description:
LinkedIn lead generation workflow using HARPA and Make.com that collects leads from searches or company employees and enriches your database with profile information.

Complete guide: https://harpa.ai/grid/linkedin-lead-generation-and-data-enrichment

All collected data is stored in a Google Sheet. You can connect it to your CRM, database, Airtable or other systems.
